content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Threat Statistics Tab The Threat Statistics tab contains widgets that display aggregated detections of security threats. The predefined widgets include: Apex Central Top Threats Apex Central Threat Statistics Threat Detection Results Policy Violation Detections C&C Callback Events Related information Apex Central Top Threats Widget Apex Central Threat Statistics Widget Threat Detection Results Widget C&C Callback Events Widget Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
